articles.title: Life in the cosmos: JWST hints at lower number of habitable planets - Nature.com
articles.description: Observations from the James Webb Space Telescope suggest that a second world in a seven-planet system lacks an atmopshere.

articles.description: Phosphorus fluoride exchange allows chemists to quickly build P–O and P–N linked compounds
articles.content: Click chemistrys toolbox has a new technique: phosphorus fluoride exchange (PFEx). This reaction enables scientists to easily build oxygen and nitrogen-linked products from a central phosphorus hub.… [+3376 chars]
